poem:
### Skate Park Summer

In the hollow hum  
of summer's drift—  
the skateboard's whisper  
calls him back.  
  
Sunlit movements,  
wheels on concrete,  
escape from screens.  
  
In the shadow of digital rest,  
the world widens,  
freedom rekindles  
on his rolling stage.
